# CANONIC Domains

inherits: /CANONIC/

> Domain-specific governance extensions for the CANONVERSE.

## Repos

| Repo | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| [MEDICINE](https://github.com/canonic-domains/MEDICINE) | Healthcare governance |
| [FINANCE](https://github.com/canonic-domains/FINANCE) | Financial governance |
| [LAW](https://github.com/canonic-domains/LAW) | Legal governance |
| [BLOCKCHAIN](https://github.com/canonic-domains/BLOCKCHAIN) | Cryptographic governance |
| [GENOMICS](https://github.com/canonic-domains/GENOMICS) | Genetic governance |

## Axioms

Domains MUST:
1. Inherit `/CANONIC/`
2. Define domain-specific vocabulary
3. Specify lattice formula (DETROS dimensions)
4. Pass kernel validation

## Links

- [Foundation](https://canonic-foundation.github.io)
- [Apps](https://canonic-apps.github.io)
